Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the information by stating that the Reserve Bank of India is all set to discontinue the Rs 2000 currency note, without any evidence or official announcement to support it.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no official notification or communication from the Reserve Bank of India regarding the discontinuation of the Rs 2000 currency note.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there has been no such announcement from the Reserve Bank of India.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the message circulating on social media and WhatsApp is true without verifying the information from official sources.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility of alternative explanations or misinformation being spread on social media and messaging platforms.
